data.title: Son of Ursula Thiess Gets Year's Term in Reformatory
data.meta_description: 18-yr-old son sentenced, Munich, for attempt to poison father
data.text:
MUNICH, Germany, April 22 (UPI)â€”A. West German juvenile court today sentenced Michael Thiess, son of Ursula Thiess, the actress, and stepson of Robert Taylor, to a year in a reformatory for trying to poison his real father.

The court convicted Michael, 18 years old, of trying to poison George Thiess, 49, West German movie producer, by pouring a chemical into his tea on Feb. 5. Mr. Thiess did not drink the tea because it had a peculiar odor.

The marriage between Ursula and George Thiess ended when Michael was 2. His mother married Mr. Taylor, the American actor, several years ago.
